DOC.brief_title: Clinical Comfort Evaluation Two Marketed Spherical Contact Lenses
DOC.detailed_description: Comparison clinical comfort performance two contact lens determine performance advantage disadvantage enfilcon A compare senofilcon A . The key variable interest initial comfort difference .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Based his/her knowledge , must good general health . 2 . Be 18 38 year old . 3 . Be able willing adhere instruction set forth protocol complete specify evaluation . 4 . Read , indicate understanding , sign Written Informed Consent . 5 . Be exist successfully adapt user soft contact lens , currently wear either study lens ( Avaira Oasys ) evaluate trial . 6 . Require visual correction eye . 7 . Require prescription +8.00D 12.00D less equal 0.75D astigmatism eye . 8 . Achieve visual acuity 20/25 good eye spherical contact lens prescription . 9 . Have normal eye evidence abnormality disease . For purpose study normal eye define one : No amblyopia . No evidence lid abnormality infection ( e.g . entropion , ectropion , chalazia , recurrent stye ) . lamp finding Grade 2 : corneal edema , tarsal abnormality , conjunctival injection ) . No active ocular disease ( e.g . glaucoma , history recurrent corneal erosion , cornea [ infiltrate ] , conjunctiva , lid , intraocular infection inflammation allergic , bacterial , viral etiology ) . No aphakia . 1 . 0.75D great refractive astigmatism either eye . 2 . Presbyopic current monovision contact lens wear . 3 . Can currently wear either lens ( Avaira Oasys ) . 4 . Presence clinically significant ( grade 24 ) anterior segment abnormality ; inflammation iritis ; infection eye , lid , associate structure . 5 . Presence ocular systemic disease need medication might interfere contact lens wear . 6 . Slit lamp finding would contraindicate contact lens wear : Pathological dry eye associate finding Pterygium , pinguecula corneal scar within visual axis Neovascularization > 0.75 mm limbus Giant papillary conjunctivitis ( GPC ) bad Grade 1 Anterior uveitis iritis ( past present ) Seborrheic eczema , seborrheic conjunctivitis History corneal ulcer fungal infection Poor personal hygiene A known history corneal hypoesthesia ( reduced corneal sensitivity ) 7 . Contact Lens best correct Snellen visual acuity ( VA ) bad 20/30 . 8 . Aphakia , Keratoconus highly irregular cornea .
